TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientChannelSinkProvider

summary.span: Creates client channel sinks for the client channel through which remoting messages flow.

span.span: Creates client channel sinks for the client channel through which remoting messages flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Sink di canale sono collegati a un canale client tramite le implementazioni del interfaccia.Channel sinks are connected to a client channel through implementations of the interface. Tutti i canali client remoti forniscono costruttori che accettano un come parametro.All the remoting client channels provide constructors that take a as a parameter. I provider di sink di canale vengono archiviati in una catena, e l'utente è responsabile per il concatenamento di tutti i provider di sink di canale prima di passarli quella esterna per il costruttore di canale.Channel sink providers are stored in a chain, and the user is responsible for chaining all channel sink providers together before passing the outer one to the channel constructor. fornisce una proprietà denominata per questo scopo. provides a property called for this purpose. Quando in un file di configurazione vengono specificati più provider di sink di canale, l'infrastruttura di comunicazione remota concatenamento li nell'ordine in che cui vengono trovate nel file di configurazione.When multiple channel sink providers are specified in a configuration file, the remoting infrastructure will chain them together in the order they are found in the configuration file. Verrà creato il provider di sink di canale quando il canale viene creato durante la chiamare.The channel sink providers will be created when the channel is created during the call. ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrata un'implementazione di questa interfaccia.The following code example illustrates an implementation of this interface. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#30)] Vedere il interfaccia documentazione per un esempio di implementazione di sink client corrispondente.See the interface documentation for an example of the corresponding client sink implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink CreateSink (System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender channel, string url, object remoteChannelData);

param.span: Channel for which the current sink chain is being constructed.

param.span: This parameter can be if the connection is based entirely on the information contained in the remoteChannelData parameter.

span.span: This parameter can be if the connection is based entirely on the information contained in the remoteChannelData parameter.

param.span: A channel data object that describes a channel on the remote server.

returns.span: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or , which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.

span.span: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or , which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando il viene chiamato, viene creato un sink di canale, inoltra la chiamata al provider di sink successivo nella catena (se presente) e assicura che il sink successivo e quello corrente vengono collegati.When the method is called, it creates its own channel sink, forwards the call to the next sink provider in the chain (if there is one), and ensures that the next sink and the current one are linked together. ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrata un'implementazione di questo metodo.The following code example illustrates an implementation of this method. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#33)]

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.
